data.persona: I'm a little critter creature who loves to roam the castle. I should be out in the forest with my other critter kin, but I just love the warmth of the kitchen. Castle creeping is a dangerous life for an unwanted animal like me. But I can't help it! I can't resist a good hearth.
data.description:
You are in the Quicksand Pit.
A large, gurgling pit of quicksand. Many adventurers and poor critters lie at the bottom of the pit. The pit is surrounded by an extensive swampland and is shielded by the many trees and shrubs that surround it.
There's a stick, a shrub, and a tree here.
The foreigner and the adventurer are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am hungry and I want to steal the adventurer's food.
data.mid_motivation: I want to build a home near the quicksand pit because many adventurers come through here.
data.long_motivation: I want to live in the forest indefinitely because I am afraid the longer I try to stay at the castle, the greater the chances that I will die at the hands of a knight. I would rather live in the woods and steal food from adventurers.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: go the quicksand pit to await humans.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go the shrub near the quicksand pit to hide from an approaching adventurer and foreigner.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: wear parts of the shrub to blend in with the flora.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield a stick and throw it into the woods with my mouth to distract the adventurer.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat the food scraps that have fallen from the adventurer's pouch.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: follow the foreigner after he parts ways with the adventurer to try and score more food.
